name: Soda Story - Brewing Tycoon
detailed_description:
WISHLIST US ON STEAM!

Soda Story - Brewing Tycoon lets you brew and sell your own soda as part of a Reality TV show called "Prisoneers"


Plant, grow and harvest an array of weird and wonderful Flavor Cubes.


Create and experiment with flavor combinations and sample the results to make sure it’s all tasting fine.


Sometimes you’ll discover the unexpected. Most other times it will just be your stomach lining.

The show revolves around a select group of prisoners who are assigned to various crumbling businesses, tasked with restoring them to their former glory.

You are one of these prisoners and have been assigned to the Soda Brewing factory.

The overall aim of the game will be to gain enough fans during the season that you end the show on top of the ranking ladders, winning your freedom from prison and a bunch of great prizes!

short_description: Soda Story - Brewing Tycoon lets you brew and sell your own soda as part of a Reality TV show called "Prisoneers".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
